name: Shooly
tagline: simple tools in C, Shell, and Awk
body:
### Description This is an ever-growing collection of C, Shell (mostly Bash), Perl, and (G)awk scripts that I've written in an attempt to broaden my systems programming skills. ### Authors and Contributors Stephen C. Sanders (@complxalgorithm)
Contact: -or-
[Website](http://stephensanders.me) ### License Copyright © 2016 Stephen C. Sanders. Licensed under the GNU GPL v.3.
Do whatever you want with these programs, I personally don't care in the slightest.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
